beginningOfMessage.title: Beginning Of Message
beginningOfMessage.description: A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit the identifying number.

documentMessageIdentification.title: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE IDENTIFICATION
documentMessageIdentification.description: Identification of a document/message by its number and eventually its version or revision.

documentMessageName.title: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE NAME
documentMessageName.description: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

messageFunctionCode.description: Code indicating the function of the message.
messageFunctionCode.title: MESSAGE FUNCTION CODE

responseTypeCode.description: Code specifying the type of acknowledgment required or transmitted.
responseTypeCode.title: RESPONSE TYPE CODE

controlTotalItems.title: Control Total Items
controlTotalItems.description: Items:  A segment to provide message control totals.

control.title: CONTROL
control.description: Control total for checking integrity of a message or part of a message.

controlTotalQuantity.description: To specify the value of a control quantity.
controlTotalQuantity.title: Control total quantity

controlTotalTypeCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the type of control of hash total.
controlTotalTypeCodeQualifier.title: Control total type code qualifier

measurementUnitCode.description: Code specifying the unit of measurement.
measurementUnitCode.title: Measurement unit code

dateTimePeriodItems.title: Date/Time/Period Items
dateTimePeriodItems.description: Items:  A segment to specify related date/time.

dateTimePeriod.title: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
dateTimePeriod.description: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a date, time or period.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.title: Date or time or period format code

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Date or time or period function code qualifier

dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.description: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.title: Date or time or period text

freeTextItems.title: Free Text Items
freeTextItems.description: Items:  A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information related to the whole message. In computer-to- computer exchanges free form text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

freeTextFormatCode.description: Code specifying the format of free text.
freeTextFormatCode.title: FREE TEXT FORMAT CODE

freeTextFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of free text.
freeTextFunctionCode.title: FREE TEXT FUNCTION CODE

textLiteral.title: TEXT LITERAL
textLiteral.description: Free text; one to five lines.

textReference.title: TEXT REFERENCE
textReference.description: Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

textSubjectCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the subject of the text.
textSubjectCodeQualifier.title: TEXT SUBJECT CODE QUALIFIER

grp1.title: grp1
grp1.description: GRP1 -  A segment group to provide information on the document being acknowledged.

dateTimePeriodItems.title: Date/Time/Period Items
dateTimePeriodItems.description: Items:  A segment to provide the relevant dates concerning the document being acknowledged.

dateTimePeriod.title: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
dateTimePeriod.description: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a date, time or period.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.title: Date or time or period format code

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Date or time or period function code qualifier

dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.description: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.title: Date or time or period text

documentMessageDetails.title: Document/Message Details
documentMessageDetails.description: A segment to provide the necessary identification information about the document being acknowledged.

communicationMediumTypeCode.description: Code specifying the type of communication medium.
communicationMediumTypeCode.title: COMMUNICATION MEDIUM TYPE CODE

documentMessageDetails.title: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE DETAILS
documentMessageDetails.description: Identification of document/message by number, status, source and/or language.

documentSourceDescription.description: Free form description of the source of a document.
documentSourceDescription.title: Document source description

documentStatusCode.description: Code specifying the status of a document.
documentStatusCode.title: Document status code

documentMessageName.title: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE NAME
documentMessageName.description: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

grp2.title: grp2
grp2.description: GRP2 -  A group of segments to specify the document/message to which the current message relates, and related date and time.

dateTimePeriodItems.title: Date/Time/Period Items
dateTimePeriodItems.description: Items:  A segment to specify the date and time of the referenced document/message.

dateTimePeriod.title: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
dateTimePeriod.description: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a date, time or period.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFormatCode.title: Date or time or period format code

dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the function of a date, time or period.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodFunctionCodeQualifier.title: Date or time or period function code qualifier

dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.description: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.
dateOrTimeOrPeriodText.title: Date or time or period text

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: A segment to indicate the reference number of the document/message.

documentLineIdentifier.description: To identify a line of a document.
documentLineIdentifier.title: Document line identifier

referenceVersionIdentifier.description: To identify the version of a reference.
referenceVersionIdentifier.title: Reference version identifier

grp3.title: grp3
grp3.description: GRP3 -  A group of segments to specify the identifications of message sender and message receiver with their contacts and communication channels.

communicationContactItems.title: Communication Contact Items
communicationContactItems.description: Items:  A segment to indicate communication channel type and number inside the party's organization, to which communication should be directed.

communicationContact.title: COMMUNICATION CONTACT
communicationContact.description: Communication number of a department or employee in a specified channel.

contactInformationItems.title: Contact Information Items
contactInformationItems.description: Items:  A segment to specify a person or department inside the party's organization, to which communication should be directed.

contactFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g. department or person).
contactFunctionCode.title: CONTACT FUNCTION CODE

departmentOrEmployeeDetails.title: DEPARTMENT OR EMPLOYEE DETAILS
departmentOrEmployeeDetails.description: Code and/or name of a department or employee. Code preferred.

departmentOrEmployeeName.description: Name of a department or employee.
departmentOrEmployeeName.title: Department or employee name

departmentOrEmployeeNameCode.description: Code specifying the name of a department or employee.
departmentOrEmployeeNameCode.title: Department or employee name code

nameAndAddress.title: Name And Address
nameAndAddress.description: A segment to specify the identification of the message issuer and message receiver.

countryNameCode.description: Identification of the name of the country or other geographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1.
countryNameCode.title: COUNTRY NAME CODE

countrySubEntityDetails.title: COUNTRY SUB-ENTITY DETAILS
countrySubEntityDetails.description: To specify a part of a country (eg county or part of a city).

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

countrySubEntityNameCode.description: Code specifying the name of a country sub-entity.
countrySubEntityNameCode.title: Country sub-entity name code

nameAndAddress.title: NAME AND ADDRESS
nameAndAddress.description: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

nameAndAddressDescription_1.description: Free form description of a name and address line.
nameAndAddressDescription_1.title: Name and address description

nameAndAddressDescription_2.description: Free form description of a name and address line.
nameAndAddressDescription_2.title: Name and address description

nameAndAddressDescription_3.description: Free form description of a name and address line.
nameAndAddressDescription_3.title: Name and address description

nameAndAddressDescription_4.description: Free form description of a name and address line.
nameAndAddressDescription_4.title: Name and address description

nameAndAddressDescription_5.description: Free form description of a name and address line.
nameAndAddressDescription_5.title: Name and address description

partyFunctionCodeQualifier.description: Code giving specific meaning to a party.
partyFunctionCodeQualifier.title: PARTY FUNCTION CODE QUALIFIER

partyIdentificationDetails.title: PARTY IDENTIFICATION DETAILS
partyIdentificationDetails.description: Identification of a transaction party by code.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

partyIdentifier.description: Code specifying the identity of a party.
partyIdentifier.title: Party identifier

partyName.title: PARTY NAME
partyName.description: Identification of a transaction party by name, one to five lines. Party name may be formatted.

partyNameFormatCode.description: Code specifying the representation of a party name.
partyNameFormatCode.title: Party name format code

postalIdentificationCode.description: Code specifying the postal zone or address.
postalIdentificationCode.title: POSTAL IDENTIFICATION CODE

street.title: STREET
street.description: Street address and/or PO Box number in a structured address: one to four lines.

streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.description: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.
streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.title: Street and number or post office box identifier

streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.description: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.
streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.title: Street and number or post office box identifier

streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.description: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.
streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.title: Street and number or post office box identifier

streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.description: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.
streetAndNumberOrPostOfficeBoxIdentifier.title: Street and number or post office box identifier

grp4.title: grp4
grp4.description: GRP4 -  A group of segments to identify the application error(s) within a specified received message and to give specific details related to the error type or to precise the type of acknowledgement.

applicationErrorInformation.title: Application Error Information
applicationErrorInformation.description: A segment identifying the type of application error or acknowledgement within the referenced message. In case of an error, the error code may specify the error in detail (e.g. a measurement relating to a piece of equipment is wrong) or as a rough indication (e.g. a measurement is wrong).

applicationErrorDetail.title: APPLICATION ERROR DETAIL
applicationErrorDetail.description: Code assigned by the recipient of a message to indicate a data validation error condition.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

freeText.title: Free Text
freeText.description: A segment to provide explanation and/or supplementary information related to the specified application error or acknowledgement. For example, the explanation may provide exact details relating to a generic error code.

freeTextFormatCode.description: Code specifying the format of free text.
freeTextFormatCode.title: FREE TEXT FORMAT CODE

freeTextFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of free text.
freeTextFunctionCode.title: FREE TEXT FUNCTION CODE

textLiteral.title: TEXT LITERAL
textLiteral.description: Free text; one to five lines.

textReference.title: TEXT REFERENCE
textReference.description: Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

textSubjectCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the subject of the text.
textSubjectCodeQualifier.title: TEXT SUBJECT CODE QUALIFIER

grp5.title: grp5
grp5.description: GRP5 -  A group of segments to specify the functional entity reference (e.g. goods item level, equipment level) relating to the specified error; further details can be added to identify the error more precisely.

freeTextItems.title: Free Text Items
freeTextItems.description: Items:  A segment to provide additional details relating to the reference, e.g. the content of the wrong data (and its exact place in the message).

freeTextFormatCode.description: Code specifying the format of free text.
freeTextFormatCode.title: FREE TEXT FORMAT CODE

freeTextFunctionCode.description: Code specifying the function of free text.
freeTextFunctionCode.title: FREE TEXT FUNCTION CODE

textLiteral.title: TEXT LITERAL
textLiteral.description: Free text; one to five lines.

textReference.title: TEXT REFERENCE
textReference.description: Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

codeListIdentificationCode.description: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.
codeListIdentificationCode.title: Code list identification code

codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.description: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.
codeListResponsibleAgencyCode.title: Code list responsible agency code

textSubjectCodeQualifier.description: Code qualifying the subject of the text.
textSubjectCodeQualifier.title: TEXT SUBJECT CODE QUALIFIER

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: A segment to provide a reference relating to the acknowledgement type or the specified error (e.g. functional entity reference such as equipment level).

documentLineIdentifier.description: To identify a line of a document.
documentLineIdentifier.title: Document line identifier

referenceVersionIdentifier.description: To identify the version of a reference.
referenceVersionIdentifier.title: Reference version identifier

dateAndTimeOfPreparation.title: Date and Time of Preparation
dateAndTimeOfPreparation.description: Date and time of preparation of the interchange.

interchangeControlReference.description: Unique reference assigned by the sender to an interchange.
interchangeControlReference.title: Interchange Control Reference

interchangeRecipient.title: Interchange Recipient
interchangeRecipient.description: Identification of the Recipient of the interchange.

partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.description: Version number of the syntax identified in the syntax identifier (0001).
partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.title: Partner Identification Code Qualifier

recipientIdentification.description: Name or coded representation of the recipient of a data interchange.
recipientIdentification.title: Recipient Identification

interchangeSender.title: Interchange Sender
interchangeSender.description: Identification of the sender of the interchange.

partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.description: Version number of the syntax identified in the syntax identifier (0001).
partnerIdentificationCodeQualifier.title: Partner Identification Code Qualifier

senderIdentification.description: Name or coded representation of the sender of a data interchange.
senderIdentification.title: Sender Identification

syntax.title: SYNTAX
syntax.description: Identification of the agency controlling the syntax and indication of syntax level.

syntaxIdentifier.description: Coded identification of the agency controlling a syntax and syntax level used in an interchange.
syntaxIdentifier.title: Syntax Identifier

syntaxTypeVersionNumber.description: Version number of the syntax identified in the syntax identifier (0001).
syntaxTypeVersionNumber.title: Syntax Type Version Number

interchangeControlCount.description: Count either of the number of messages or, if used, of the number of functional groups in an interchange.
interchangeControlCount.title: Interchange Control Count

interchangeControlReference.description: Unique reference assigned by the sender to an interchange.
interchangeControlReference.title: Interchange Control Reference

messageHeader.title: Message Header
messageHeader.description: A service segment starting and uniquely identifying a message. The message type code for the Application error and acknowledgement message is APERAK.

commonAccessReference.description: Reference serving as a key to relate all subsequent transfers of data to the same business case or file.
commonAccessReference.title: COMMON ACCESS REFERENCE

messageIdentifier.title: MESSAGE IDENTIFIER
messageIdentifier.description: Identification of the type, version, etc. of the message being interchanged.

associationAssignedCode.description: Code, assigned by the association responsible for the design and maintenance of the message type concerned, which further identifies the message.
associationAssignedCode.title: Association assigned code

codeListDirectoryVersionNumber.description: Version number of the code list directory.
codeListDirectoryVersionNumber.title: Code list directory version number

messageReleaseNumber.description: Release number within the current message version number.
messageReleaseNumber.title: Message release number

messageType.description: Code identifying a type of message and assigned by its controlling agency.
messageType.title: Message type

messageTypeSubFunctionIdentification.description: Code identifying a sub-function of a message type.
messageTypeSubFunctionIdentification.title: Message type sub-function identification

messageVersionNumber.description: Version number of a message type.
messageVersionNumber.title: Message version number

messageImplementationGuidelineIdentifica.title: MESSAGE IMPLEMENTATION GUIDELINE IDENTIFICATION
messageImplementationGuidelineIdentifica.description: Identification of a message implementation guideline by its identifier, version, release and source.
Coded identification of the message implementation guideline, assigned by its controlling agency.
messageImplementationGuidelineIdentifica.title: Message implementation guideline identification

messageImplementationGuidelineReleaseNum.description: Release number within the message implementation guideline version number.
messageImplementationGuidelineReleaseNum.title: Message implementation guideline release number

messageImplementationGuidelineVersionNum.description: Version number of the message implementation guideline.
messageImplementationGuidelineVersionNum.title: Message implementation guideline version number

messageReferenceNumber.description: Unique message reference assigned by the sender.
messageReferenceNumber.title: MESSAGE REFERENCE NUMBER

messageSubsetIdentification.title: MESSAGE SUBSET IDENTIFICATION
messageSubsetIdentification.description: Identification of a message subset by its identifier, version, release and source.
Coded identification of a message subset, assigned by its controlling agency.
messageSubsetIdentification.title: Message subset identification

messageSubsetReleaseNumber.description: Release number within the message subset version number.
messageSubsetReleaseNumber.title: Message subset release number

messageSubsetVersionNumber.description: Version number of the message subset.
messageSubsetVersionNumber.title: Message subset version number

scenarioReleaseNumber.description: Release number within the scenario version number.
scenarioReleaseNumber.title: Scenario release number

statusOfTheTransfer.title: STATUS OF THE TRANSFER
statusOfTheTransfer.description: Statement that the message is one in a sequence of transfers relating to the same topic.

firstAndLastTransfer.description: Indication used for the first and last message in a sequence of messages related to the same topic.
firstAndLastTransfer.title: First and last transfer

sequenceOfTransfers.description: Number assigned by the sender indicating the transfer sequence of a message related to the same topic. The message could be an addition or a change to an earlier transfer related to the same topic.
sequenceOfTransfers.title: Sequence of transfers

messageTrailer.title: Message Trailer
messageTrailer.description: A service segment ending a message, giving the total number of segments in the message (including the UNH & UNT) and the control reference number of the message.

messageReferenceNumber.description: Unique message reference assigned by the sender.
messageReferenceNumber.title: MESSAGE REFERENCE NUMBER

numberOfSegmentsInAMessage.description: The number of segments in a message body, plus the message header segment and message trailer segment.
numberOfSegmentsInAMessage.title: NUMBER OF SEGMENTS IN A MESSAGE
